short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Alaia is a wellness and mindfulness platform that encourages digital wellbeing for all ages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Alaia is a wellness and mindfulness platform that encourages digital wellbeing for all ages. Alaia integrates effective parental guidance tools that encourage smart use of our digital devices with the ancient practice of Mindfulness. Your Alaia subscription includes access to hundreds of guided mindfulness exercises created in collaboration with experts, and a Daily Happiness question that is clinically proven to improve your overall happiness.  Alaia also embeds popular and effective principles of growth mindset, character education, and gratitude into its Mindfulness exercises.
